mapper.select: SELECT board1_no, board1_title, board1_content, board1_regdate, board1_isshow, member_name, member_class FROM board1 WHERE board1_isshow='Y' ORDER BY board1_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board1(board1_title, board1_content, board1_regdate, board1_isshow, member_name, member_class) values(#{board1_title},#{board1_content},now(),'Y','John Doe','A')
mapper.delete: UPDATE board1 AS b JOIN comment1 AS c ON b.board1_no = c.board1_no SET b.board1_isshow = 'N', c.comment1_isshow = 'N' WHERE b.board1_no = #{board1_no};
